name: Monster Music
description:
A funny group of Monsters that make funny sounds!

This Cute and simple app for kids is part "Jack in the Box", part Peek-a-boo and part Monstrous Xylophone!

Touch the monster and it pops up and makes a funny monstrous sound! Touch the bat and touch the cloud for more sounds! Fun and interactive!

Great for toddlers and up!

Especially great for kids who love funny monsters!

Fun for all!

*Compatible with: iPod Touch 3 & 4 generation, iPhone 3GS, iPhone4 & iPad/iPad2.

-----------------------------------------------

*Note: NOT Compatible with: First generation iPhone, iPhone 3G, and iPod Touch 1st & 2nd generation.

-----------------------------------------------
